title: Sample, ca. 1948
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 22 x 24 cm (8 11/16 x 9 7/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Twill weave in muted colors. Warp is stripes of seventeen ends, each green, gray, light brown and light purple boucle. Weft is a repeating pattern sequence of seventeen gray chenille yarns with flat metallic yarns, sixteen brown chenille yarns, nineteen flat metallic with narrow gray ratiné yearns, and fourteen blue chenille yarns.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample, ca. 1948.
ca. 1948. Medium: synthetic, cotton
Technique: 2/2 twill. Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin. 1972-75-62.
